(Simplified: 龛)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 合 indicates the sound; 龍 (dragon) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 合 [ hé ] to combine, to join, to unite; to gather
    • 龍 [ lóng ] dragon; symbol of the emperor
①供奉佛像、神位等的小閣子：佛龕。神龕。
②古同“戡”，平定。
龕影 [ kān yǐng ]: niche as shown in an X-Ray (medicine)

龕字的基本解释

龕
kān
见“龛”。

龕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kān］
［《廣韻》口含切，平覃，溪。］
“龛1”的繁体字。
(1)供奉神佛或神主的石室或小阁子。
(2)泛指墙上小室。参见“龕室”、“龕壁”。
(3)塔下室。指僧人的墓穴。
(4)僧人的棺。即塔状盛尸器。
(5)小的窟穴或房屋。
(6)通“堪”。能。
(7)通“戡”。平定。
(8)用同“嵌”。镶嵌。
(9)山名。在浙江省萧山市东。

龕字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【龍字部】　龕； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1537第16
【唐韻】口含切【集韻】枯含切【正韻】苦含切，?音堪。【說文】龍貌。　又【爾雅·釋言】洵龕也。【註】未詳。　又【玉篇】受也，盛也。【揚子·方言】龕，受也。齊楚曰鋡，揚越曰龕。受盛也，猶秦晉言容盛也。【郭註】今言龕囊，由此名也。　又【廣雅】龕，取也。【揚子·法言】劉龕南陽。【註】取也。同戡。　又【玉篇】聲也。【揚子·方言】龕，喊㖪唏聲。　又勝也。【謝靈運詩】龕暴資神理。　又浮圖塔。一曰塔下室。【唐褚遂良書】久棄塵世，與彌勒同龕。又【杜甫詩】禪龕只晏如。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】劉龕南陽。〕　謹照原書方言改法言。

niche
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kān］
["Guangyun" mouth cut, Pingtan, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "龛1".
(1) Stone chambers or small pavilions dedicated to gods and Buddhas or gods.
(2) Refers to the small room on the wall in general. See "niche", "niche wall".
(3) The lower room of the tower. Refers to the tomb of a monk.
(4) The monk's coffin. That is, the tower-shaped corpse container.
(5) Small caves or houses.
(6) Through "can". can.
(7) Through "戡". put down.
(8) Use the same "embedded". mosaic.
(9) The name of the mountain. East of Xiaoshan City, Zhejiang Province.
niche

[Tang Yun] Mouth Hanqi [Jiyun] Dry Hanqi [Zheng Yun] Bitter Hanqi,? The sound is good. [Said the text] Long appearance.　[Erya·Interpretation] Xun niche also. 【Note】Unknown.　[Jade Chapter] Shou Ye, Sheng Ye. [Yangtze Dialect] Niches, accepting. Qi Chu said 鋡, Yang Yue said niche. Shousheng also, but also Qin and Jin dialects Rongsheng. [Guo's Note] This is the name of the niche.　[Guangya] Niche again, take it. [Yangzi·Fayan] Liu Kan Nanyang. [Note] Take also. Same fight.　[Jade Chapter] The sound is also. [Yangtze Dialect] Shout, shout.　Katsuya again. [Xie Lingyun's poem] The theology of niche violence.　Futu Tower again. One said the lower room of the tower. [Tang Chu Suiliang Book] For a long time, he abandoned the world and lived in the same niche with Maitreya. And [Du Fu Poem] The Zen niche is only Yan Ru.
